page.title: 09Education in Magor
page.content: The Community of Magor has two Primary Schools. This year both Schools have had building.Magor have had a new extension and Undy are having a new school built.The obvious reasons for these developments are because of the growing population in this area.These two Schools are slightly different from each othor in the respect that Magor is a Church school and Undy a council school.As it is a Church school the Church helped pay the cost with additional help from the county council. I go to Magor V.A.P school.It is a large school with about 220 children in it with 7 teachers.We have many subjects,such as Maths,English and Environmental studies.The top class have a computer to themselves.We have three computers altogether.
